title: Save up to 25% on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus with this Online Offer!
description: Grab the S24 Plus for a more affordable price. The post Save up to 25% on the Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus with this Online Offer! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab the S24 Plus for a more affordable price.
text: It probably goes without saying that Samsung’s Galaxy S24 series phones are among the best Android phones that you can get right now, and for good reason – Samsung has packed a lot of neat hardware into its newest phones, as well as some nifty new software tricks that add a bit more value in terms of what a smartphone can do. As such, buyers looking forward to grabbing the Samsung Galaxy S24 Plus might want to check out this deal, which gets you 25% off the phone’s usual asking price. The Galaxy S24 Plus features a new and improved aluminum design, a vibrant AMOLED display, as well as the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset, which packs a lot of improvements for everyday performance and gaming. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
